SEARCH
Package edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.control

Class DataController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.control.DataController
public class DataController extends Object
Singleton controller class for managing all system data. Demonstrates Singleton design pattern and centralized data management.
